title: When Bronzies attack
body:
Trying to explain why Q max is best on Garen in Sirchez's stream over his old E spin max because it was overnerfed and doesn't rank up in damage well anymore per level so every high ELO Garen max's Q first now.
Sirchez's chat threw a fit because they are apparently stuck in season 4-5 where E max was actually good.

Them feels when you know most of them are probably bronze 5. I don't care if someone is low ELO really, but it's funny how quick they are to attack you because they think they still know Garen when they actually don't.

replies.body: Welcome to youtube/twitch chat where everyone is bronze and bad.
Low ELO always gets upset when you talk about their wafiu's no matter how bad they are
wouldnt garen be husbandu or are we talking about something else
husbando, actually. they usually can't say the du sound(unless it's through pronouncing ru/lu because some words just sound a bit off), it would be more like dzu.

I got griefed back into bronze and even I know to level Q.

I don't even play Garen much.

That's because the only follow builds and skill ranks because they don't have any idea about it, like when sneaky went runaans vayne and got a solo penta but everyone was shit talking the build before it. They don't understand so they trash talk.

It's pretty funny actually
